statements: SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome = 'Recovered';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patient_outcomes WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' AND treatment = 'Oxygen Therapy';
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, outcome FROM patient_outcomes WHERE treatment LIKE '%Surgery%';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patient_outcomes WHERE outcome = 'Recovered';
SELECT * FROM patient_outcomes WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment FROM patient_outcomes WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND outcome = 'Discharged' ORDER BY admission_date, patient_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients, diagnosis FROM patient_outcomes GROUP BY diagnosis HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date, outcome FROM patient_outcomes WHERE treatment LIKE '%medication%' ORDER BY admission_date;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM Patients ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC, patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_date, outcome_description FROM Patients JOIN Outcomes ON Patients.patient_id = Outcomes.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM Outcomes o LEFT JOIN Patients p ON o.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE o.readmission = True AND p.age BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_date FROM Patients p JOIN Outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id WHERE o.outcome_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY outcome_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_description FROM patients p JOIN outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, cost FROM patients JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id WHERE cost > 500 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, outcome_description, outcome_date FROM patients JOIN outcomes ON patients.patient_id = outcomes.patient_id WHERE outcome_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY outcome_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM treatments WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT diagnosis_name, description FROM Diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM Doctors;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, hospital_name FROM Doctors ORDER BY doctor_name DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT diagnosis_id, diagnosis_name, description FROM Diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 456 AND diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY diagnosis_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT DISTINCT admit_date, diagnosis FROM admissions ORDER BY admit_date DESC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM treatments WHERE cost < 1000 ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT indicator_name, benchmark_score FROM quality_indicators WHERE indicator_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC, patient_name
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE admit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%infection%'
SELECT patient_name, admit_date, discharge_date FROM admissions ORDER BY discharge_date DESC, admit_date
